mobility.1: 2 sets of 10 arm circles each direction
mobility.2: 2 sets of 10 hip rotations each side
mobility.3: 2 sets of 10 shoulder rolls each direction

stretches.2: 30 seconds hip flexor stretch each side
stretches.6: 30 seconds shoulder and tricep stretch each arm

introSteps.title: Welcome to Sensei.ai!
introSteps.content: Your personal martial arts training companion. Let's get you started with a quick tour.

introSteps.title: Warm-up First
introSteps.content: Always start with our guided warm-up routine to prevent injuries and prepare your body.

introSteps.title: Choose Your Level
introSteps.content: Select your difficulty level - Basic, Intermediate, or Advanced - to get combinations that match your skill.

introSteps.title: Dynamic Combinations
introSteps.content: Get fresh, challenging combinations tailored to your level. Generate new ones anytime!

introSteps.title: Time Your Training
introSteps.content: Use our professional timer or stopwatch to structure your training sessions effectively.

introSteps.title: Talk to Sensei AI
introSteps.content: Ask me anything about martial arts, training, or fitness. I'm here to help!
